content: But Shungen didn't care about it, he just gave you a familiar smile and you two walked together towards your class.

speaker: Me
content: Are we too early? We didn't see anyone.

speaker: Shungen
content: Yeah, actually I didn't expect you to come so early, and I wanted to surprise you.

speaker: Me
content: Actually you already gave me a surprise and a certain amount of shock when you were shooting me that time.
As you were just about to walk into the classroom, you noticed that the door of the next classroom suddenly opened.

speaker: Nolitusne
content: hun! I knew you would come early.

speaker: Me
content: Nolitusne! How did you end up at this school too? Aren't you supposed to go to the school your uncle recommended for you?
The pink-haired boy in front of you is the child of your and Shungen's elders' work counterparts.
And because you're the same age you've always been pulled out by both parents for comparison.
You don't really care about it because you've been compared since you were little, so you're used to it, but Nolitusne doesn't seem to think so.

speaker: Nolitusne
content: Now that we're in the same high school, I'm going to surpass you!
My uncle used to compare you to me forever, and I'm sick of it! I'm going to win over you!
You feel a little confused because you don't really understand why Nolitusne reacted so much and why it was preferable to win over you.

chooseItem.text: Yeah, well, this is a chance for us to compete in our senior year of high school!
"I don't see the point in that, but if you want to compete, I'll be happy to do so.
